casebody.data:
The RESIDENCES AT BILTMORE CONDOMINIUM OWNERS' ASSOCIATION, INC.
v.
POWER DEVELOPMENT, LLC and Mountain Mortgage, Inc. No. 390P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. David R. Payne, Asheville, for Power Development, LLC, et al. Ronald K. Payne, Asheville, for the Residences at Biltmore Condominium Owners' Association, Inc. Erin F. Dunnuck, for the Residences at Biltmore Condominium Owners' Association, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 4th of December 2015 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
